   21: %%
   22: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
   23: %% Purpose: Verify the application specifics of the Megaco application
   24: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
   25: -module(megaco_timer_SUITE).
   26: 
   27: -compile({no_auto_import,[error/1]}).
   28: 
   29: -export([
   30:  	 suite/0, all/0, groups/0,
   31:          init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1,
   32:          init_per_group/2, end_per_group/2,
   33:          init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2,
   34: 
   35: 	 simple_init/1,
   36: 	 simple_usage/1,
   37: 	 integer_timer_start_and_expire/1, 
   38: 	 integer_timer_start_and_stop/1
   39: 
   40: 	]).
   41: 
   42: -export([
   43: 	 timeout/3
   44: 	]).
   45: 
   46: -include("megaco_test_lib.hrl").
   47: -include_lib("megaco/include/megaco.hrl").
   48: -include_lib("megaco/include/megaco_message_v1.hrl").
   49: 
   50: 
   51: -define(TEST_VERBOSITY, info). % silence | info | debug
   52: 
   53: 
   54: 
   55: %%======================================================================
   56: %% Common Test interface functions
   57: %%======================================================================
   58: 
   59: suite() -> 
   60:     [{ct_hooks, [ts_install_cth]}].
   61: 
   62: all() -> 
   63:     [{group, simple}, {group, integer_timer}].
   64: 
   65: groups() -> 
   66:     [
   67:      {simple,        [], simple_cases()},
   68:      {integer_timer, [], integer_timer_cases()}
   69:     ].
   70: 
   71: simple_cases() ->
   72:     [
   73:      simple_init,
   74:      simple_usage
   75:     ].
   76: 
   77: integer_timer_cases() ->
   78:     [
   79:      integer_timer_start_and_expire,
   80:      integer_timer_start_and_stop
   81:     ].
   82: 
   83: 
   84: 
   85: %%
   86: %% -----
   87: %%
   88: 
   89: init_per_suite(suite) ->
   90:     [];
   91: init_per_suite(doc) ->
   92:     [];
   93: init_per_suite(Config0) when is_list(Config0) ->
   94: 
   95:     ?ANNOUNCE_SUITE_INIT(),
   96: 
   97:     p("init_per_suite -> entry with"
   98:       "~n      Config: ~p"
   99:       "~n      Nodes:  ~p", [Config0, erlang:nodes()]),
  100: 
  101:     case ?LIB:init_per_suite([{sysmon, false} | Config0]) of
  102:         {skip, _} = SKIP ->
  103:             SKIP;
  104: 
  105:         Config1 when is_list(Config1) ->
  106: 
  107:             p("init_per_suite -> end when"
  108:               "~n      Config: ~p"
  109:               "~n      Nodes:  ~p", [Config1, erlang:nodes()]),
  110: 
  111:             Config1
  112:     end.
  113: 
  114: end_per_suite(suite) -> [];
  115: end_per_suite(doc) -> [];
  116: end_per_suite(Config0) when is_list(Config0) ->
  117: 
  118:     p("end_per_suite -> entry with"
  119:       "~n      Config: ~p"
  120:       "~n      Nodes:  ~p", [Config0, erlang:nodes()]),
  121: 
  122:     Config1 = ?LIB:end_per_suite(Config0),
  123: 
  124:     p("end_per_suite -> end when"
  125:       "~n      Nodes:  ~p", [erlang:nodes()]),
  126: 
  127:     Config1.
  128: 
  129: 
  130: %%
  131: %% -----
  132: %%
  133: 
  134: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  135:     Config.
  136: 
  137: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  138:     Config.
  139: 
  140: 
  141: 
  142: %%
  143: %% -----
  144: %%
  145: 
  146: init_per_testcase(Case, Config) ->
  147:     do_init_per_testcase(Case, Config).
  148: 
  149: do_init_per_testcase(Case, Config) ->
  150:     process_flag(trap_exit, true),
  151: 
  152:     p("init_per_suite -> entry with"
  153:       "~n      Config: ~p"
  154:       "~n      Nodes:  ~p", [Config, erlang:nodes()]),
  155: 
  156:     {ok, _Pid} = megaco_monitor:start_link(),
  157:     megaco_test_lib:init_per_testcase(Case, [{monitor_running, true}|Config]).
  158: 
  159: end_per_testcase(Case, Config) ->
  160:     process_flag(trap_exit, false),
  161: 
  162:     p("end_per_suite -> entry with"
  163:       "~n      Config: ~p"
  164:       "~n      Nodes:  ~p", [Config, erlang:nodes()]),
  165: 
  166:     case lists:keydelete(monitor_running, 1, Config) of
  167: 	Config ->
  168: 	    megaco_test_lib:end_per_testcase(Case, Config);
  169: 	Config2 ->
  170: 	    megaco_monitor:stop(),
  171: 	    megaco_test_lib:end_per_testcase(Case, Config2)
  172:     end.
  173: 
  174: 
  175: 
  176: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  177: 
  178: simple_init(suite) ->
  179:     [];
  180: simple_init(doc) ->
  181:     [];
  182: simple_init(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  183:     Pre  = fun() -> #{} end,
  184:     Case = fun(_) -> do_simple_init() end,
  185:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
  186:     try_tc(?FUNCTION_NAME, Pre, Case, Post).
  187: 
  188: do_simple_init() ->
  189:     put(verbosity, ?TEST_VERBOSITY),
  190:     put(tc,        si),
  191:     put(sname,     "TEST"),
  192:     put(verbosity, info),
  193:     i("starting"),
  194: 
  195:     Init = 
  196: 	fun(Tmr) ->
  197: 		case (catch megaco_timer:init(Tmr)) of
  198: 		    {WaitFor, {NewTmr, _}} when 
  199: 		        (((WaitFor == infinity) or is_integer(WaitFor)) andalso 
  200: 			 is_record(NewTmr, megaco_incr_timer) andalso
  201: 			 (is_record(Tmr, megaco_incr_timer) andalso 
  202: 			  (Tmr#megaco_incr_timer.max_retries == infinity_restartable))) ->
  203: 			ok;
  204: 		    {WaitFor, NewTmr} when 
  205: 			 (((WaitFor == infinity) or is_integer(WaitFor)) andalso 
  206: 			  ((NewTmr == timeout) or is_record(NewTmr, megaco_incr_timer))) ->
  207: 			ok;
  208: 		    X ->
  209: 			d("initiation of timer failed: "
  210: 			  "~n   X: ~p", [X]),
  211: 			{error, X}
  212: 		end
  213: 	end,
  214:     Verify = 
  215: 	fun(A, A) ->
  216: 		ok;
  217: 	   (error, {error, Reason}) ->
  218: 		d("Error reason: ~p", [Reason]),
  219: 		ok;
  220: 	   (A, B) ->
  221: 		d("unexpected result: "
  222: 		  "~n   Expected: ~p"
  223: 		  "~n   Actual:   ~p", [A, B]),
  224: 		unexpected_result(A, B)
  225: 	end,
  226:     VerifyTMR = 
  227: 	fun(false, Tmr) -> 
  228: 		not megaco_timer:verify(Tmr);
  229: 	   (true, Tmr) ->
  230: 		megaco_timer:verify(Tmr)
  231: 	end,
  232: 
  233:     d(" 1) verify infinity timer"), 
  234:     TMR01 = infinity,
  235:     Verify(true,  VerifyTMR(true, TMR01)),
  236:     Verify(ok,    Init(TMR01)),
  237: 
  238:     d(" 2) verify integer (2007) timer"), 
  239:     TMR02 = 2007,
  240:     Verify(true,  VerifyTMR(true, TMR02)),
  241:     Verify(ok,    Init(TMR02)),
  242: 
  243:     d(" 3) verify default megaco incr timer timer"), 
  244:     TMR03 = #megaco_incr_timer{},
  245:     Verify(true,  VerifyTMR(true, TMR03)),
  246:     Verify(ok,    Init(TMR03)),
  247: 
  248:     d(" 4) verify megaco incr timer timer"), 
  249:     TMR04 = #megaco_incr_timer{max_retries = infinity_restartable},
  250:     Verify(true,  VerifyTMR(true, TMR04)),
  251:     Verify(ok,    Init(TMR04)),
  252: 
  253:     d(" 5) verify megaco incr timer timer"), 
  254:     TMR05 = #megaco_incr_timer{incr = -1}, %% This is new
  255:     Verify(true,  VerifyTMR(true, TMR05)),
  256:     Verify(ok,    Init(TMR05)), 
  257: 
  258:     d(" 6) verify invalid timer"), 
  259:     TMR06 = infinit,
  260:     Verify(true,  VerifyTMR(false, TMR06)),
  261:     Verify(error, Init(TMR06)),
  262: 
  263:     d(" 7) verify invalid timer"), 
  264:     TMR07 = -2007,
  265:     Verify(true,  VerifyTMR(false, TMR07)),
  266:     Verify(error, Init(TMR07)),
  267: 
  268:     d(" 8) verify invalid timer"), 
  269:     TMR08 = 20.33,
  270:     Verify(true,  VerifyTMR(false, TMR08)),
  271:     Verify(error, Init(TMR08)),
  272: 
  273:     d(" 9) verify invalid timer"), 
  274:     TMR09 = -20.33,
  275:     Verify(true,  VerifyTMR(false, TMR09)),
  276:     Verify(error, Init(TMR09)),
  277: 
  278:     d("10) verify invalid timer"), 
  279:     TMR10 = "kalle anka", 
  280:     Verify(true,  VerifyTMR(false, TMR10)),
  281:     Verify(error, Init(TMR10)),
  282: 
  283:     d("11) verify invalid timer"), 
  284:     TMR11 = #megaco_incr_timer{wait_for    = 10,
  285: 			       factor      = 1,
  286: 			       incr        = 0,
  287: 			       max_retries = infinit},
  288:     Verify(true,  VerifyTMR(false, TMR11)),
  289:     Verify(error, Init(TMR11)),
  290: 
  291:     i("done", []),
  292:     ok.
  293: 
  294: 
  295: 
  296: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  297: 
  298: simple_usage(suite) ->
  299:     [];
  300: simple_usage(doc) ->
  301:     [];
  302: simple_usage(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  303:     Pre  = fun() -> #{} end,
  304:     Case = fun(_) -> do_simple_usage() end,
  305:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
  306:     try_tc(?FUNCTION_NAME, Pre, Case, Post).
  307: 
  308: do_simple_usage() ->
  309:     put(verbosity, ?TEST_VERBOSITY),
  310:     put(tc,        su),
  311:     put(sname,     "TEST"),
  312:     i("starting"),
  313: 
  314:     Verify  = fun(Tmr) -> megaco_timer:verify(Tmr)  end,
  315:     Init    = fun(Tmr) -> megaco_timer:init(Tmr)    end,
  316:     Restart = fun(Tmr) -> megaco_timer:restart(Tmr) end,
  317: 
  318:     VerifyRes = 
  319: 	fun(A, A) ->
  320: 		ok;
  321: 	   (A, B) ->
  322: 		unexpected_result(A, B)
  323: 	end,
  324: 
  325: 
  326:     %% Timer 1
  327:     d(" 1) verify (infinity) timer"), 
  328:     TMR01 = infinity,
  329:     VerifyRes(true,  Verify(TMR01)), 
  330:     d(" 1) init (infinity) timer"), 
  331:     VerifyRes({TMR01, timeout}, Init(TMR01)),
  332: 
  333:     %% Timer 2
  334:     d(" 2) verify (integer) timer"), 
  335:     TMR02 = 1000,
  336:     VerifyRes(true,  Verify(TMR02)), 
  337:     d(" 2) init (integer) timer"), 
  338:     VerifyRes({TMR02, timeout}, Init(TMR02)),
  339: 
  340:     %% Timer 3
  341:     d(" 3) verify (megaco_incr_timer) timer"), 
  342:     TMR03 = #megaco_incr_timer{wait_for    = TMR02,
  343: 			       factor      = 1,
  344: 			       incr        = 0,
  345: 			       max_retries = infinity}, 
  346:     VerifyRes(true,  Verify(TMR03)), 
  347:     d(" 3) init (megaco_incr_timer) timer"), 
  348:     {TMR02, NewTMR03_1} = Init(TMR03),
  349:     d(" 3) restart (megaco_incr_timer) timer"), 
  350:     {TMR02, _}          = Restart(NewTMR03_1),
  351: 
  352:     %% Timer 4
  353:     d(" 4) verify (megaco_incr_timer) timer"), 
  354:     TMR04 = #megaco_incr_timer{wait_for    = 1000,
  355: 			       factor      = 1,
  356: 			       incr        = 0,
  357: 			       max_retries = 2}, 
  358:     VerifyRes(true,  Verify(TMR04)), 
  359:     d(" 4) init (megaco_incr_timer) timer"), 
  360:     {TMR02, NewTMR04_1} = Init(TMR04),
  361:     d(" 4) restart (megaco_incr_timer) timer"), 
  362:     {TMR02, NewTMR04_2} = Restart(NewTMR04_1),
  363:     d(" 4) last restart (megaco_incr_timer) timer"), 
  364:     {TMR02, timeout}    = Restart(NewTMR04_2),
  365: 
  366:     %% Timer 5
  367:     d(" 5) verify (megaco_incr_timer) timer"), 
  368:     TMR05 = #megaco_incr_timer{wait_for    = 1000,
  369: 			       factor      = 1,
  370: 			       incr        = -300,
  371: 			       max_retries = infinity}, 
  372:     VerifyRes(true,  Verify(TMR05)), 
  373:     d(" 5) init (megaco_incr_timer) timer"), 
  374:     {TMR02, NewTMR05_1}     = Init(TMR05),
  375:     d(" 5) restart (1) (megaco_incr_timer) timer"), 
  376:     TMR05_1 = TMR02-300,
  377:     {TMR05_1, NewTMR05_2} = Restart(NewTMR05_1),
  378:     d(" 5) restart (2) (megaco_incr_timer) timer"), 
  379:     TMR05_2 = TMR05_1-300,
  380:     {TMR05_2, NewTMR05_3} = Restart(NewTMR05_2),
  381:     d(" 5) restart (3) (megaco_incr_timer) timer"), 
  382:     TMR05_3 = TMR05_2-300,
  383:     {TMR05_3, NewTMR05_4} = Restart(NewTMR05_3),
  384:     d(" 5) restart (4) (megaco_incr_timer) timer"), 
  385:     {0, NewTMR05_5}         = Restart(NewTMR05_4),
  386:     d(" 5) restart (5) (megaco_incr_timer) timer"), 
  387:     {0, _}                  = Restart(NewTMR05_5),
  388: 
  389:     i("done", []),
  390:     ok.
  391: 
  392: 
  393: 
  394: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  395: 
  396: integer_timer_start_and_expire(suite) ->
  397:     [];
  398: integer_timer_start_and_expire(doc) ->
  399:     [];
  400: integer_timer_start_and_expire(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  401:     Cond = fun() ->
  402:                    Key = megaco_factor,
  403:                    case lists:keysearch(Key, 1, Config) of
  404:                        {value, {Key, F}} when (F > 5) ->
  405:                            {skip, ?F("Megaco Factor (~w) > 5", [F])};
  406:                        _ ->
  407:                            ok
  408:                    end
  409:            end,
  410:     Pre  = fun() -> #{} end,
  411:     Case = fun(_) -> do_integer_timer_start_and_expire() end,
  412:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
  413:     try_tc(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, Case, Post).
  414: 
  415: do_integer_timer_start_and_expire() ->
  416:     Timeout = 5000,
  417:     i("start timer"),
  418:     Ref = tmr_start(Timeout),
  419:     i("await timer expire"),
  420:     receive
  421:         {timeout, Timeout} ->
  422:             i("received expected timer expire message"),
  423:             ok
  424:     after Timeout + 500 ->
  425:             i("timeout-message timeout"),
  426:             tmr_stop(Ref),
  427:             no_timeout()
  428:     end.
  429: 
  430: 
  431: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  432: 
  433: integer_timer_start_and_stop(suite) ->
  434:     [];
  435: integer_timer_start_and_stop(doc) ->
  436:     [];
  437: integer_timer_start_and_stop(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  438:     Cond = fun() ->
  439:                    Key = megaco_factor,
  440:                    case lists:keysearch(Key, 1, Config) of
  441:                        {value, {Key, F}} when (F > 5) ->
  442:                            {skip, ?F("Megaco Factor (~w) > 5", [F])};
  443:                        _ ->
  444:                            ok
  445:                    end
  446:            end,
  447:     Pre  = fun() -> #{} end,
  448:     Case = fun(_) -> do_integer_timer_start_and_stop() end,
  449:     Post = fun(_) -> ok end,
  450:     try_tc(?FUNCTION_NAME, Cond, Pre, Case, Post).
  451: 
  452: do_integer_timer_start_and_stop() ->
  453:     i("starting"),
  454: 
  455:     Timeout = 5000,
  456:     i("try start (~w msec) timer", [Timeout]),
  457:     Ref     = tmr_start(Timeout),
  458:     i("timer started "),
  459:     receive
  460: 	{timeout, Timeout} ->
  461:             i("unexpected premature timer expire"),
  462: 	    bad_timeout()
  463:     after Timeout - 100 ->
  464:             i("try stop timer"),
  465: 	    case tmr_stop(Ref) of
  466:                 {ok, Rem} ->
  467:                     i("timer stopped with ~w msec remaining", [Rem]),
  468:                     ok;
  469:                 CancelRes ->
  470:                     i("failed stop timer: "
  471:                       "~n   ~p", [CancelRes]),
  472:                     ?SKIP({cancel_failed, CancelRes}) % Race - not our problem
  473:             end
  474:     end,
  475: 
  476:     %% Make sure it does not reach us after we attempted to stop it.
  477:     receive
  478: 	{timeout, Timeout} ->
  479: 	    unexpected_timeout()
  480:     after Timeout ->
  481: 	    ok
  482:     end,
  483: 
  484:     i("done", []),
  485:     ok.
  486: 
  487: 
  488: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  489: 
  490: tmr_start(Timeout) ->
  491:     Pid = self(), 
  492:     megaco_monitor:apply_after(?MODULE, timeout, 
  493: 			       [Pid, Timeout, get(tc)], Timeout).
  494: 
  495: tmr_stop(Ref) ->
  496:     megaco_monitor:cancel_apply_after(Ref).
  497: 
  498: timeout(Pid, Timeout, Tc) ->
  499:     put(sname, timer),
  500:     put(tc, Tc), 
  501:     print("DBG",
  502: 	  "timeout -> entry with"
  503: 	  "~n   Pid:     ~p"
  504: 	  "~n   Timeout: ~p", [Pid, Timeout]),
  505:     Pid ! {timeout, Timeout}.
  506: 
  507: 
  508: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  509: 
  510: try_tc(Name, Pre, Case, Post) ->
  511:     Cond = fun() -> ok end,
  512:     try_tc(Name, Cond, Pre, Case, Post).
  513: 
  514: try_tc(Name, Cond, Pre, Case, Post) ->
  515:     ?TRY_TC(Name, "TEST", ?TEST_VERBOSITY, Cond, Pre, Case, Post).
  516: 
  517: 
  518: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  519: 
  520: unexpected_result(A, B) ->
  521:     error({unexpected_result, A, B}).
  522: 
  523: no_timeout() ->
  524:     error(no_timeout).
  525: 
  526: bad_timeout() ->
  527:     error(bad_timeout).
  528: 
  529: unexpected_timeout() ->
  530:     error(unexpected_timeout).
  531: 
  532: 
  533: error(Reason) -> throw({error, Reason}).
  534: 
  535: 
  536: %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
  537: 
  538: p(F, A) ->
  539:     io:format("*** [~s] ~p ***"
  540: 	      "~n   " ++ F ++ "~n", 
  541: 	      [?FTS(), self() | A]).
  542: 
  543: i(F) ->
  544:     i(F, []).
  545: 
  546: i(F, A) ->
  547:     print(info, "INF", F, A).
  548: 
  549: d(F) ->
  550:     d(F, []).
  551: 
  552: d(F, A) ->
  553:     print(debug, "DBG", F, A).
  554: 
  555: printable(_, debug)   -> true;
  556: printable(info, info) -> true;
  557: printable(_,_)        -> false.
  558: 
  559: 
  560: print(Severity, Prefix, F, A) ->
  561:     print1(printable(Severity, get(verbosity)), Prefix, F, A).
  562: 
  563: print1(true, Prefix, F, A) ->
  564:     print(Prefix, F, A);
  565: print1(_, _, _, _) ->
  566:     ok.
  567: 
  568: print(Prefix, F, A) ->
  569:     io:format("*** [~s] ~s ~p ~s:~w ***"
  570:               "~n   " ++ F ++ "~n", 
  571:               [?FTS(), Prefix, self(), get(sname), get(tc) | A]).
  572: 
  573:
